General.Name: Alicanto Minerals Ltd
General.Description: Alicanto Minerals Limited operates as a mineral exploration company in Sweden. The company explores for gold, zinc, lead, silver, and copper deposits. Its primary properties, including the Greater Falun copper-gold project and the Sala silver-lead-zinc project. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is based in West Perth, Australia.
General.Address: 8 Richardson Street, West Perth, WA, Australia, 6005
